      • Country

        public Country(java.lang.String n,
               java.lang.String I,
               int s,
               int US,
               int USSR,
               boolean b,
               Continents[] c,
               java.lang.String[] i)
        Constructor for a Country object
        Parameters:
        n - name of country
        I - ISO code of country
        s - stability number of country
        US - current US influence
        USSR - current USSR influence
        b - true for battleground countries
        c - ArrayList of continents the country is a member of
        i - List of connected countries in String

      • isValidDefconCountry

        public boolean isValidDefconCountry(int defcon)
        Parameters:
        defcon - The defcon level
        Returns:
        If the country is available to realignment or coup it returns true, else false.

      • isCountryInContinent

        public boolean isCountryInContinent(Continents cont)
        Parameters:
        cont - Continents
        Returns:
